description: A "No-neck" Youkai and one of Rikuo`s demon guardians. He fights using thread that entangle you the more you struggle, made from Kejourou`s personality and Jorougumo`s restriants. Part of Rikuo`s new "Hyakki Yakou" he is traveling to Kyoto. He used to go by the name `Joushuu No Gentsatsushi Kubinashi` (Lit. String Assassin of Hitachi Province) and is strong enough to restrain Toono youkai easily using his "Black string" technique. He seems to be a gizoku (honorable thief) before he joined the Nura clan. He goes back to his murderous way in Kyoto and is confronted by Ibaraki Douji. He was almost killed by Ibaraki Douji until he was saved by Kappa and Yura.
name: Kubinashi
